Title: Dolphin Tale 2
Overview: The team of people who saved Winter's life reassemble in the wake of her surrogate mother's passing in order to find her a companion so she can remain at the Clearwater Marine Hospital.
Tagline: WINTER's amazing true story... now has HOPE.
production_companies: Alcon Entertainment, Color Force, Boxing Cat Films, St. Petersburg Clearwater Film Commission
Cast: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Nathan Gamble
clean_text: dolphin tale 2 team people save winter life reassemble wake surrogate mother pass order find companion remain clearwater marine hospital winter amazing true story hope family drama charle martin smith morgan freeman ashley judd nathan gamble 2014
